unnormalised: New Delhi, October 26 – India is making significant strides in its commitment to renewable energy, with experts like Dr. Sharma from IIT-Delhi advocating for increased solar power adoption. The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE) recently announced new initiatives to encourage rooftop solar installations in residential areas, offering subsidies up to Rs. 50,000 for systems covering 500 sq ft.
